Engine

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.GameState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntroState, Options, SinglePlayerGame

    public abstract class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    Every unique game screen should extend this class. Game states should be switched using only the GameStateManager instance.
